funds.name: SPDR Straits Times Index ETF
funds.description: Tracks the performance of the Straits Times Index, a market capitalization weighted index that tracks the performance of the top 30 companies listed on the Singapore Exchange.

funds.name: Nikko AM Singapore STI ETF
funds.description: Seeks to replicate the performance of the Straits Times Index, providing investors with access to the Singapore equity market.

funds.name: Lion-OCBC Securities Singapore Low Carbon ETF
funds.description: Provides exposure to Singapore companies with reduced carbon footprint, allowing investors to align with sustainable investment goals.

funds.name: Lion-Phillip S-REIT ETF
funds.description: Focuses on Singapore REITs, providing investors with exposure to the real estate market and typically generating higher yields.

funds.name: NikkoAM-StraitsTrading Asia ex Japan REIT ETF
funds.description: Provides diversified exposure to REITs across Asia (excluding Japan), focusing on property income and capital appreciation.

funds.name: CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust
funds.description: One of the largest REITs in Singapore focusing on integrated developments including shopping malls and commercial properties.

funds.name: Mapletree Industrial Trust
funds.description: A REIT investing in industrial properties and data centers in Singapore and North America.

funds.name: ABF Singapore Bond Index Fund
funds.description: Invests in Singapore government and quasi-government bonds, providing fixed income exposure with lower risk.

funds.name: NikkoAM-ICBCChina Bond ETF SGD
funds.description: Provides exposure to Chinese government and policy bank bonds, offering diversification benefits.

funds.name: Lion-OCBC Securities Hang Seng TECH ETF
funds.description: Tracks the Hang Seng TECH Index, providing exposure to the 30 largest technology companies listed in Hong Kong.
